articles.description: Vijayan Rajoo gave sugar and water to a brain tumour patient instead of morphine, hearing told.
articles.content:
A nurse has been struck off after giving sugar and water to a brain tumour patient instead of morphine. 
Vijayan Rajoo, a nurse at St Fillians care home in Colchester, Essex, felt the man did not ne… [+2230 chars]

articles.title: Hundreds of thousands of UK households ditch Amazon Prime - The Telegraph
articles.description: Cost of living crisis hits streaming companies hard, according to Ofcom report
articles.content:
Almost 600,000 British households cancelled their Amazon Prime subscriptions ahead of a price rise as the cost of living crisis hits streaming companies.
The number of UK Prime customers fell by 590… [+2866 chars]
